verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. I waited <S%H6960><s%> patiently <S%H6960><s%> for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And he inclined <S%H5186><s%> unto me <S%H8085><s%>, and heard my cry <S%H7775><s%>.

He brought me up <S%H5927><s%> also out of a horrible <S%H7588><s%> pit <S%H953><s%>, out of the miry <S%H3121><s%> clay <S%H2916><s%>; And he set <S%H6965><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> upon a rock <S%H5553><s%>, and established <S%H3559><s%> my goings <S%H838><s%>.

And he hath put <S%H5414><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> in my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, even praise <S%H8416><s%> unto our God <S%H430><s%>: Many <S%H7227><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H3372><s%>, and fear, And shall trust <S%H982><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> that maketh <S%H7760><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> his trust <S%H4009><s%>, And respecteth <S%H6437><s%> not the proud <S%H7295><s%>, nor such as turn aside <S%H7750><s%> to lies <S%H3577><s%>.

Many <S%H7227><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, are the wonderful <S%H6381><s%> works which thou hast done <S%H6213><s%>, And thy thoughts <S%H4284><s%> which are to us-ward <S%H6186><s%>; They cannot be set in order unto thee <S%H5046><s%>; If I would declare and speak <S%H1696><s%> of them <S%H6105><s%>, They are more than can be numbered <S%H5608><s%>.

Sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and offering <S%H4503><s%> thou hast no delight <S%H2654><s%> in <S%H241><s%>; Mine ears hast thou opened <S%H3738><s%>: Burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> and sin-offering <S%H5930><s%> hast thou not required <S%H7592><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> I <S%H935><s%>, Lo, I am come; In the roll <S%H4039><s%> of the book <S%H5612><s%> it is written of me <S%H3789><s%>:
I delight <S%H2654><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> thy will <S%H7522><s%>, O my God <S%H430><s%>; Yea <S%H8451><s%>, thy law is within <S%H8432><s%> my heart <S%H4578><s%>.

I have proclaimed <S%H1319><s%> glad tidings of righteousness <S%H6664><s%> in the great <S%H7227><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%>; Lo <S%H3607><s%>, I will not refrain my lips <S%H8193><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou knowest <S%H3045><s%>.

I have not hid <S%H3680><s%> thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%>; I have declared <S%H559><s%> thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and thy salvation <S%H8668><s%>; I have not concealed <S%H3582><s%> thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and thy truth <S%H571><s%> from the great <S%H7227><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%>.

Withhold <S%H3607><s%> not thou thy tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> from me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; Let thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and thy truth <S%H571><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> preserve me <S%H5341><s%>.

For innumerable <S%H4557><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> have compassed <S%H661><s%> me about <S%H5771><s%>; Mine iniquities have overtaken <S%H5381><s%> me <S%H3201><s%>, so that I am not able to look up <S%H7200><s%>; They are more <S%H6105><s%> than the hairs <S%H8185><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>; And my heart <S%H3820><s%> hath failed me <S%H5800><s%>.
Be pleased <S%H7521><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to deliver <S%H5337><s%> me <S%H2363><s%>: Make haste to help <S%H5833><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah.

Let them be put to shame <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H954><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> That seek <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H5595><s%> it <S%H5472><s%>: Let them be turned backward <S%H268><s%> and brought to dishonor <S%H3637><s%> That delight <S%H2655><s%> in my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
Let them be desolate <S%H8074><s%> by reason <S%H6118><s%> of their shame <S%H1322><s%> That say <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1889><s%>, Aha, aha <S%H1889><s%>.

Let all those that seek <S%H1245><s%> thee rejoice <S%H7797><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in thee <S%H157><s%>: Let such as love thy salvation <S%H8668><s%> say <S%H559><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> be magnified <S%H1431><s%>.

But I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>; Yet the Lord <S%H136><s%> thinketh <S%H2803><s%> upon me <S%H5833><s%>: Thou art my help and my deliverer <S%H6403><s%>; Make no tarrying <S%H309><s%>, O my God <S%H430><s%>.
